Here is a reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 about Cantonese natural language processing (NLP) and low-resource languages
Cantonese Language Processing: A Survey

This article provides an overview of Cantonese NLP, including its history, current state, and future directions. It also discusses the challenges and opportunities in developing NLP systems for Cantonese
Cantonese Word Segmentation Using Conditional Random Fields

This article presents a word segmentation algorithm for Cantonese using conditional random fields. The algorithm is evaluated on a large Cantonese corpus and compared to other state-of-the-art methods
Cantonese Sentiment Analysis Using Deep Learning

This article presents a deep learning-based approach for Cantonese sentiment analysis. The approach uses a combination of convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and recurrent neural networks (RNNs) to classify Cantonese text into positive or negative sentiment
Cantonese Dependency Parsing Using Recursive Neural Networks

This article presents a dependency parsing algorithm for Cantonese using recursive neural networks. The algorithm is evaluated on a large Cantonese corpus and compared to other state-of-the-art methods
